desc: This is a quiz about Physics. It asks some questions that fall into the vast topic of Physics, a branch of science that delves into the study of matter, motion, and energy. This quiz will have five questions.

questions.text: Q1: What is the SI unit of force?

Q5: What is the term for the minimum angle at which a light ray is reflected back into a material and cannot pass into the surrounding medium?
